article.headline: Houston 71, Marshall 58
article.story: HOUSTON (AP) -- Robert McKiver scored 19 points and six of Houston's first seven baskets were 3-pointers in a 71-58 victory against Marshall on Saturday night. McKiver had three of those game-opening six 3-pointers for the Cougars (15-3, 4-0 Conference USA), whose lead was never fewer than six points after a 14-0 run put them ahead 17-9 with 14:13 remaining in the first half. Dion Dowell made five of nine from 3-point range for all of his 15 points for Houston, which shot 42 percent (14-of-33) on 3-pointers. Darryl Merthie also was 5-of-9 on 3-pointers and scored 22 points for the Thundering Herd (10-8, 2-3). Mark Dorris scored 11, and Tyler Wilkerson had 10 points and 10 rebounds off the bench. Marshall led 6-0 when Kelvin Lewis hit a 3-pointer for Houston's first score. Marshall's lead reached 9-3 before Dowell hit consecutive 3-pointers to tie. After a dunk by Tafari Toney, McKiver hit three 3-pointers to push Houston's lead to 20-11 with 13:20 left in the half. The Cougars led 40-27 at halftime and never let the Thundering Herd get closer in the second half. Houston's Lanny Smith had 10 assists. Toney led Houston with six rebounds and three blocks.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
